A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I usually try not to be nit picky when reviewing action movies\, but several lame scenes\, unnecessary plot twists\, and new weak characters made this movie miss the mark for me.  Yes\, it had a some good humor\, decent action scenes\, but these were not enough to overcome its shortcomings.  Also\, the movie seemed to barely hold the \"Star Wars\" feeling for long periods through out the movie.  If it wasn't a Star Wars film\, I don't think I would have been as critical (like a 3.5 movie)\, but being Star Wars and having high expectations I give this a 2 out of 5 (I don't know how critical reviews are over 90%!).
